Life Coach & Talent Igniter with a mission: raise awareness of human potential.

I'm passionate about human development, to challenge possibilities and for awakening the best in every person I come across.

For the last 10 years I have been fully dedicated to helping entrepreneurs, professional sports coaches and athletes, to improve their performance through the development of their emotional intelligence, leadership and communication.

Please visit my website for more https://joaocordeiro.com
